00010 /* byte swapping routines */
00011 #ifdef  alpha
00012 #define BYTESWAP
00013 #endif

00015 #ifdef i386
00016 #define BYTESWAP
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 #ifdef i486
00020 #define BYTESWAP
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #ifdef i586
00024 #define BYTESWAP
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #ifdef x86_64
00028 #define BYTESWAP
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #ifdef x86_64mac
00032 #define BYTESWAP
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 
00036 #ifndef WORDSWAP
00037 
00038 #define MSB(x)  (((x) >> 8) & 0xff)  
00039 #define LSB(x)  ((x) & 0xff)         
00040 #define MSW(x) (((x) >> 16) & 0xffff)
00041 #define LSW(x) ((x) & 0xffff)        
00043 #define WORDSWAP(x) (MSW(x) | (LSW(x) << 16))
00044 
00045 #define LLSB(x) ((x) & 0xff)            
00046 #define LNLSB(x) (((x) >> 8) & 0xff)
00047 #define LNMSB(x) (((x) >> 16) & 0xff)
00048 #define LMSB(x)  (((x) >> 24) & 0xff)
00049 
00050 #define LONGSWAP(x) ((LLSB(x) << 24) | \
00051                      (LNLSB(x) << 16)| \
00052                      (LNMSB(x) << 8) | \
00053                      (LMSB(x)))
00054 
00055 #endif
00056

00074 #define sqr(x)  ((x)*(x))
00075 #define cube(x)  ((x)*(x)*(x))
00076 #define macro_sign(x) ((x) > 0 ? (1) : (x) < (0) ? (-1) : (0))

00097 
00098 #define SINCOS(v,sv,cv)               \
00099     *(cv)=cos(v);                     \
00100     *(sv)=sqrt(1.- (*(cv))*(*(cv)));  \
00101     if (fmod(fmod(v,2*PI)+2.*PI,2.*PI) > PI) {    \
00102       *(sv) *= -1.;                   \
00103     }

00234 /* ============================================================================
00235  * MATRIX/MATRIX MULTIPLICATION METHODS
00236  * ============================================================================
00237  */
00238 /* multiplies two arbitrary matrices: c=a*b */
00239 int      mat_mult(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00240 /* multiply submatrices of a and b: c=a[1:ar,1:ac]*b[1:br,1:bc] */        
00241 int      mat_mult_size(Matrix a, int ar, int ac, Matrix b, 
00242                        int br, int bc, Matrix c);
00243 /* multiplies a matrix with the transpose of the other: c=a*b' */
00244 int     mat_mult_normal_transpose(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00245 int     mat_mult_normal_transpose_size(Matrix a, int ar, int ac, 
00246                                        Matrix b, int br, int bc,
00247                                        Matrix c);
00248 /* multiplies transpose of a matrix with the other: c=a'*b */
00249 int     mat_mult_transpose_normal(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00250 int     mat_mult_transpose_normal_size(Matrix a, int ar, int ac, 
00251                                        Matrix b, int br, int bc,
00252                                        Matrix c);
00253 /* multiplies transpose of a matrix with transpose of the other: c=a'*b'*/
00254 int     mat_mult_transpose_transpose(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00255 int     mat_mult_transpose_transpose_size(Matrix a, int ar, int ac, 
00256                                           Matrix b, int br, int bc, 
00257                                           Matrix c);
00258 /* consistency method (wraps mat_mult()): c=a*b */
00259 int     mat_mult_normal_normal(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00260 /* Perform an elementwise matrix multiplication (like matlab's c=a.*b) */
00261 int     mat_dmult_normal_normal(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00262 /* Perform an elementwise matrix multiplication: c=a.*b' */
00263 int     mat_dmult_normal_transpose(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00264 /* Perform an elementwise matrix multiplication: c=a'.*b */
00265 int     mat_dmult_transpose_normal(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00266 /* Perform an elementwise matrix multiplication: c=a'.*b' */
00267 int     mat_dmult_transpose_transpose(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00268 /* Wrapper for mat_dmult_normal_normal(): c=a.*b */
00269 int     mat_dmult(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);
00270 
00271 
00272 /* ============================================================================
00273  * MATRIX/VECTOR MULTIPLICATION METHODS
00274  * ============================================================================
00275  */
00276 /* multiplies matrix with vector: c=a*b */
00277 int      mat_vec_mult(Matrix a, Vector b, Vector c);
00278 /* multiplies submatrix with subvector: c=a[1:ar,1:ac]*b[1:br] */
00279 int      mat_vec_mult_size(Matrix a, int ar, int ac,
00280                            Vector b,int br, Vector c);
00281 /* multiplies vector with matrix: c=a'*b */
00282 int      vec_mat_mult(Vector a, Matrix b, Vector c); 
00283 
00284 
00285 /* sets the vector to the function of the other one */
00286 int      vec_equal_apply_math(Vector a, double (*func)(double),Vector c);
00287 int     ivec_equal_apply_math(iVector a, int (*func)(int), iVector c);

00289 /* ============================================================================
00290  * MATRIX/VECTOR ADDITION METHODS
00291  * ============================================================================
00292  */
00293 /* adds two arbitrary matrices */
00294 int      mat_add(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);         
00295 /* add submatrices of a and b: c=a[1:nr,1:nc]+b[1:nr,1:nc] */        
00296 int      mat_add_size(Matrix a, Matrix b, int nr, int nc, Matrix c);
00297 /* Add a vector to each row of a matrix */
00298 int      mat_add_vec_rows(Matrix a, Vector b, Matrix c);
00299 /* Add a vector to each column of a matrix */
00300 int      mat_add_vec_columns(Matrix a, Vector b, Matrix c);
00301 /* adds two arbitrary vectors */
00302 int      vec_add(Vector a, Vector b, Vector c);         
00303 int      vec_add_size(Vector a, Vector b, int nr, Vector c);
00304 /* adds scalar to vectors */
00305 int      vec_add_scalar(Vector a, double scalar, Vector c);         
00306 /* adds a scalar to matrix */
00307 int      mat_add_scalar(Matrix a, double scalar, Matrix c);
00308 
00309 /* ============================================================================
00310  * MATRIX/VECTOR SUBTRACTION METHODS
00311  * ============================================================================
00312  */
00313 /* subtractss two arbitrary matrices */
00314 int      mat_sub(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c);         
00315 /* Subtract a vector from each row of a matrix */
00316 int      mat_sub_vec_rows(Matrix a, Vector b, Matrix c);
00317 /* Subtract a vector from each column of a matrix */
00318 int      mat_sub_vec_columns(Matrix a, Vector b, Matrix c);
00319 /* subtracts two arbitrary vectors */
00320 int      vec_sub(Vector a, Vector b, Vector c);         
00321 int      vec_sub_size(Vector a, Vector b, int nr, Vector c);
00322 
00323 /* ============================================================================
00324  * MATRIX/VECTOR ELEMENT SUM METHODS
00325  * ============================================================================
00326  */
00327 /* sum's up the elements of the vector */
00328 int      vec_sum(Vector a, double* s);
00329 /* compute the weighted sum of a vector */
00330 int      vec_sum_weighted(Vector a, Vector w, double *s);
00331 /* sums along the rows of a matrix */
00332 int      mat_sum_rows(Matrix a, Vector b);
00333 /* compute a weighted sum of the rows of a matrix */
00334 int      mat_sum_rows_weighted(Matrix a, Vector w, Vector b);
00335 /* sums along the columns of a matrix */
00336 int      mat_sum_columns(Matrix a, Vector b);
00337 /* compute a weighted sum of the columns of a matrix */
00338 int      mat_sum_columns_weighted(Matrix a, Vector w, Vector b);
